documentation.text: @title VaultStandardAMM: abstract base class for all PancakeSwap style AMM contracts. Maximizes yield in AMM.
@notice Public function for farming Want token.
@notice Internal function for farming Want token. Responsible for staking Want token in a MasterChef/MasterApe-like contract

@notice Internal function for unfarming Want token. Responsible for unstaking Want token from MasterChef/MasterApe contracts
 @param _wantAmt the amount of Want tokens to withdraw. If 0, will only harvest and not withdraw
@notice The main compounding (earn) function. Reinvests profits since the last earn event.
@title VaultStandardAMM: abstract base class for all PancakeSwap style AMM contracts. Maximizes yield in AMM.
@notice Public function for farming Want token.
@notice Internal function for farming Want token. Responsible for staking Want token in a MasterChef/MasterApe-like contract

@notice Internal function for unfarming Want token. Responsible for unstaking Want token from MasterChef/MasterApe contracts
 @param _wantAmt the amount of Want tokens to withdraw. If 0, will only harvest and not withdraw
@notice The main compounding (earn) function. Reinvests profits since the last earn event.

params._wantAmt: amount of Want token to deposit/stake

params._amount: The amount of the tokens to transfer
params._to: The address to transfer tokens to
params._token: Address of the ERC20 token to transfer

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._rewardsAddress: the address of the Rewards contract

params._entranceFeeFactor: Entrance fee numerator (higher means smaller percentage)
params._withdrawFeeFactor: Withdrawal fee numerator (higher means smaller percentage)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._wantAmt: the amount of Want tokens to withdraw

devdoc.title: VaultStandardAMM: abstract base class for all PancakeSwap style AMM contracts. Maximizes yield in AMM.

convertDustToEarned().notice: Converts dust tokens into earned tokens, which will be reinvested on the next earn()

earn().notice: The main compounding (earn) function. Reinvests profits since the last earn event.

farm().notice: Public function for farming Want token.

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256,add.notice: Safely transfer ERC20 tokens stuck in this contract to a specified address

setBurnAddress(address).notice: Set the burn address (for removing tokens out of existence)

setRewardsAddress(address).notice: set the address of the contract to send controller fees to

setUniRouterAddress(address).notice: Set the address of the periphery/router contract (Pancakeswap/Apeswap/etc.)

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw Want tokens from the Farm contract

wrapBNB().notice: wrap BNB (public version, only callable by gov)
